name: fbdraganddrop
description: A drag and drop web interface to Font Bakery check-ttf.

scripts.prepare: bower install --allow-root && browserify ./lib/static/js/bower_components/jiff/jiff.js -s jiff -o ./lib/static/js/bower_components/jiff/jiff.umd.js && browserify ./lib/static/js/bower_components/jiff/lib/jsonPointer -s jsonPointer -o ./lib/static/js/bower_components/jiff/jsonPointer.umd.js

author: Lasse Fister <commander@graphicore.de>
